grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 穏健【オンケン】quiet, dependable, uniform, (politically) moderate
温和【オンワ】mild (climate), temperate, clement, pleasant, agreeable, gentle (nature, personality, etc.), mild, quiet, pleasant, moderate (statement, measure, etc.), mild, temperate
無事平穏【ブジヘイオン】peace and quiet, safe and peaceful, tranquil and uneventful
kun reading compounds: 穏やか【おだやか】calm, gentle, quiet
穏やかに話す【おだやかにはなす】to talk quietly
